Take a simple example: If you were looking at crime rates in Chicago, trying to compare those to crime rates in a tiny town in Oklahoma would not be easy to understand. By comparing a location\u2019s data to corresponding data from similar locales, it allows the journalist to identify patterns, outliers, and the general universe of the data. That\u2019s why we made CounText - we take a complicated step out of your research process to get you to your story faster and better.
